description: This file defines the 'SavedJobsPage' React component, responsible for displaying a list of saved jobs fetched from a global app context. It imports styling, context, and a JobList component, and renders a page with a header, helper text, and the list of saved jobs with functionality to remove jobs.

methods.name: SavedJobsPage()
methods.description: Functional React component that displays saved jobs using data from context, allowing users to view and remove saved jobs.
